titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to release a reversionary interest of the United States in certain real property previously conveyed to the State of Tennessee.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: 2/29/2000--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to release a reversionary interest of the United States that required certain real property in Johnson City, Tennessee, which was conveyed to the State of Tennessee, to be used primarily for training of the National Guard and for military purposes.
